result.markdown:
---
title: "Hypothesis"
author: Ahyeong Jeong
date: "2024-08-05"
categories: [Statistics]
---

### 필요한 패키지 불러오기 

::: {#34eb1f9c .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
from scipy.stats import t
```
:::


### 문제 데이터 

::: {#bfaa3159 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
cars = np.array([15.078, 15.752, 15.549, 15.56, 16.098, 13.277, 15.462, 16.116, 15.214, 16.93, 14.118, 14.927,
15.382, 16.709, 16.804])
```
:::


### 필요한 모수 구하기 

::: {#7f4dbe3c .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
n = len(cars)
sample_mean = np.mean(cars)
sample_std = np.std(cars, ddof= 1)
```
:::


### 2.
null: mu >= 16.0
alter: mu < 16.0

### 3.

::: {#5efc6d71 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
t_value = (sample_mean - 16) / (sample_std/np.sqrt(n))
print('t_value :', t_value)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
t_value : -1.8500447456376756
```
:::
:::


### 4.

::: {#ac10c415 .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
p_value = (t.cdf(t_value, 14))
print('p_value :', p_value)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
p_value : 0.042762417664207845
```
:::
:::


### 6. 

::: {#005cc96c .cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
sample_mean - t.ppf(0.975, df =  14) * (sample_std / np.sqrt(n)), sample_mean + t.ppf(0.975, df =  14) * (sample_std / np.sqrt(n))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6}
```
(14.988864240339733, 16.074602426326933)
```
:::
:::


###선생님 풀이 

::: {#6ae77fd8 .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from scipy.stats import ttest_1samp
ttest_1samp(cars, 16, alternative = 'less')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7}
```
TtestResult(statistic=-1.8500447456376756, pvalue=0.042762417664207845, df=14)
```
:::
:::


표본의 평균 복합 에너지 효율은 15.53173이고, 검정통계량값은 -1.85이다. 
t검정통계량에 대응하는 p-value값 0.04276가 유의수준인 1% 보다 크므로, 귀무가설을 기각하지 못한다.
따라서 22년 현대 자동차 신형 모델 그룹의 평균 에너지 소비효율은 1등급을 만족한다고 판단한다.
